text:
Concept Reply AG | Embedded Software Engineer | Munich, Germany | Full-Time, Onsite, Visa support

We are team of engineers doing contract projects and consulting mostly for automotive companies. Recently we are busy doing development for carsharing modules. If you are interested to know more or even participate and have following qualifications:

  - Successfully completed university studies in Electrical engineering, Automotive engineering, Computer science or similar
  - Knowledge in the area of Real Time SW (OS and application layer), Embedded and RT Linux (OS and application layer) 
  - Good understanding in Embedded specifics (development in strictly limited hardware resources)
  - Proven knowledge in common Embedded programming languages (C++, C, Assembler, Python, Java)
  - Embedded communication buses and protocols (UART, SPI, I2C, CAN, etc.)
  - Experience working in an agile environment
and some of additional:

  - Knowledge in the area of HW design and development (PCB, HW debug)
  - Embedded profiling and debugging (PMU, JTAG etc), specific Linux distributions (Android, Yocto)
  - Understanding of test code coverage especially for Embedded Software use cases
  - Reading proficiency in German
then you can contact me via e-mail in my profile, will be happy to talk to you!

See our linkedin page here: https://www.linkedin.com/company/concept-reply/

Also you can glance at reply group (which we are part of) official website here: https://www.reply.com/
